title: About This Blog
text: Once midterm season is over, I aim to update this blog. This space is where I’ll share those in-between moments: what I’m reading, what I’m questioning, and what research looks like behind the scenes. If science is about understanding how minds work, then this blog is about understanding how my thinking evolves along the way.

title: My First Blog Post
text: This is my little corner to think out loud. Here, I’ll jot down ideas as they come, questions that keep me up at night, and observations about research, life, and everything in between. It’s messy, unfinished, and personal—just a place where my curiosity gets to roam freely. Drink Coffee. Wrok. Repeat.
